venom_grumbo.name: Venom Grumbo
venom_grumbo.description: Poisonous. Toxic. But most importantly, Venomous. Venom Grumbo administers poison to its victims and deals extra damage to them as well!
venom_grumbo.victory: $name has claimed victory over Eddi-- Venom Grumbo!
venom_grumbo.loss: $name lay defeated in a pool of Venom Grumbo's toxic wasteland!

crimson_grumbo.name: Crimson Grumbo
crimson_grumbo.description: The red-eyed Crimson Grumbo. His crimson eyes make for some scary effects!
crimson_grumbo.loss: $name was erased off the face of planet by Crimson Grumbo!
